alerts.selectNumberField: Plugin Description: Obtain the latest time and status of a logistics node based on the tracking number

placeholder.number: Please select the column corresponding to the tracking number
placeholder.latestTime: Please select the field corresponding to the latest node time
placeholder.latestStatus: Please select the field corresponding to the latest node status
placeholder.apiAddress: Please enter the API interface address
placeholder.diff: Please select the field corresponding to the logistics information refresh result
